Welcome to the documentation of SPARKS!

SPARKS (The Forge of Hephaestus) is a powerful divine engine for email queue management, designed to offer reliability, speed, and intelligent SMTP server rotation.

In this documentation, you will find everything needed to configure your forge and master the fire of messaging.
